column2: <START>  BOYCOTT THE GENOCIDE BEIJING 2022 WINTER OLYMPICS  UNTIL THE CRIMINAL MINI MAO xi AND THE CCP CRIMINAL CULT REGIME STOP1 KILLING THEIR OWN PEOPLE 2 STOP THE HUMAN ORGAN HARVESTING3 STOP THE HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS 4 STOP THE UIGHUR GENOCIDE FREE TIBET HONG KONG stop the harassment of TAIWAN 5 STOP THE TERRORIST AND BIOWEAPON ACTIVITY 6 STOP THE HOSTAGE DIPLOMACY  7 THE MANY OTHER CRIMES BY THE CCP CRIMINAL CULT REGIME MINI MAO xi AND THE CCP MUST BE HELD ACCOUNTABLE FOR THEIR CRIMES AGAINST HUMANITY INCLUDING THE DEVELOPMENT AND THE DELIBERATE SPREADING OF THEIR CCP VIRUS
